attributes.action: GET BREXIT DONE NOW OR WALK AWAY!
attributes.additional_details: There are certain factions of our Government who's wish is to overturn the Will of the People. These people are deliberately attempting to derail Brexit and remain in the EU. This cannot be allowed. The people have spoken and they have voted to leave the EU.
attributes.background: We voted to Leave the EU, to Stop Making Payments to the EU, to Take Back Control of our Laws and to Take Back Control of our Borders. If this cannot be achieved immediately JUST WALK AWAY!
